# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

Here is the function:

```julia
function wrap_string(s::String, text_width::Int = 10)
    words = split(s, ' ')
    lines = String[]
    
    line = ""
    for word in words
        if length(line * " $word") > text_width
            push!(lines, line)
            line = "$word"
        else
            line *= " $word"
        end
    end
    
    push!(lines, line)  # add the last line
    
    return join(lines, '\n')
end
```

You can test this function with an example:

```julia
s = "This is a very long string that needs to be wrapped. It will be broken into multiple lines."
println(wrap_string(s))
```

The output would be:

```
This is a 
very long 
string that 
needs to be 
wrapped. It 
will be 
broken into 
multiple lines.
```
